title: Can SIN beat the Chiefs?
body:
I think they actually can beat the Chiefs, however this week I don't think they will. 

Flaresz has looked fairly descent so far, and if the rest of the team were on the same page, SIN could have had some much better results. The Chiefs don't seem to like dealing with the 4-1 split push strategy too much, as their strength is in grouping well and team fighting, so if Flaresz has a good day and if this tactic is employed and executed well, this might just upset the Chiefs.

On the other hand, Chief are a good team, and after coming off a loss will be right on there game this week(as all good teams are), so it will be tough for SIN to cause the upset against such quality opposition with such a focus on returning to winning ways.

My tip: Chiefs 2-0.
